definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: An innocent plowman is more worthy than a vicious prince.
sentences.chinese: 一個邪惡的王子不如一個清白的莊稼漢有價值。

sentences.english: Dark skin and strong muscles are indispensable to farmers.
sentences.chinese: 黝黑的皮膚，健壯的肌肉是飾演莊稼漢的必備條件。

sentences.english: An innocent plowman is more worthy than a vicious prince.
sentences.chinese: 一個邪惡的王子還不如一個清白的莊稼漢有價值。
